Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Glove = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local vPlayer local myTorso local myHumanoid
local genericTextLabel local sg local frame
local otherPlayer
local challengeGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
local challengeAccepted = false local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local cloneId = 68452456 local cloneAsset = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(cloneId):GetChildren()[1] local cloneChildren = cloneAsset:GetChildren() for i = 1, #cloneChildren do if cloneChildren[i]:IsA("Script") then cloneChildren[i].Disabled = true end end
local vClone local otherClone
local unequipped = false
local slapSound
function createFloatingIcon(pos, icon, suspension, speed) local p = Instance.new("Part") p.Name = "FloatingPoint" p.FormFactor = "Custom" p.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) p.Transparency = 1 p.CanCollide = false p.CFrame = CFrame.new(pos)
local bf = Instance.new("BodyForce") bf.force = Vector3.new(0, speed * (196.0 * p:GetMass()), 0)
local bbGui = Instance.new("BillboardGui") bbGui.Size = UDim2.new(2, 0, 2,0 ) bbGui.Adornee = p
local imageLabel = Instance.new("ImageLabel") imageLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) imageLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1 imageLabel.Image = icon
imageLabel.Parent = bbGui bbGui.Parent = p bf.Parent = p p.Parent = game.Workspace debris:AddItem(p, suspension) end
function createFloatingText(pos, text, suspension, speed) local p = Instance.new("Part") p.Name = "FloatingPoint" p.FormFactor = "Custom" p.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) p.Transparency = 1 p.CanCollide = false p.CFrame = CFrame.new(pos)
local bf = Instance.new("BodyForce") bf.force = Vector3.new(0, speed * (196.0 * p:GetMass()), 0)
local bbGui = Instance.new("BillboardGui") bbGui.Size = UDim2.new(2, 0, 1, 0) bbGui.Adornee = p
local textLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel") textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) textLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1 textLabel.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size18 textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0, 1, 0) textLabel.Text = text
textLabel.Parent = bbGui bbGui.Parent = p bf.Parent = p p.Parent = game.Workspace debris:AddItem(p, suspension) end
function createClone(character) if character then local thisClone = cloneAsset:Clone() local children = character:GetChildren() for i = 1, #children do if children[i] then if children[i].ClassName == "Hat" then -- Special local hat = Instance.new("Hat") local Hpart = children[i].Handle:Clone() Hpart.Parent = hat Hpart.Position = thisClone.Head.Position hat.Name = children[i].Name hat.Parent = thisClone hat.AttachmentPos = children[i].AttachmentPos hat.AttachmentRight = children[i].AttachmentRight hat.AttachmentUp = children[i].AttachmentUp hat.AttachmentForward = children[i].AttachmentForward elseif children[i].Name == "Head" then local headChildren = children[i]:GetChildren() local cloneHead = thisClone:FindFirstChild("Head") local cloneHeadChildren = cloneHead:GetChildren() for j = 1, #cloneHeadChildren do if cloneHeadChildren then cloneHeadChildren[j]:Destroy() end end for k = 1, #headChildren do if headChildren[k] then local c = headChildren[k]:Clone() if c then c.Parent = cloneHead end end end elseif children[i].ClassName == "ForceField" or children[i].ClassName == "Script" or children[i].ClassName == "LocalScript" or children[i]:IsA("Humanoid") then -- Ignore it elseif children[i]:IsA("BasePart") then if thisClone[children[i].Name] then thisClone[children[i].Name].BrickColor = children[i].BrickColor end else children[i]:Clone().Parent = thisClone end end end return thisClone end end
function createGame() if otherPlayer then if frame then frame.Visible = false end vClone = createClone(vPlayer.Character) otherClone = createClone(otherPlayer.Character)
if vClone and otherClone then vClone.Name = vCharacter.Name otherClone.Name = otherPlayer.Character.Name vClone.Torso.CFrame = myTorso.CFrame vClone.Parent = game.Workspace
game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CameraSubject = vClone game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CameraType = "Custom"
myTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 65000, 0) ) myTorso.Anchored = true
local deployScript = Tool.CameraHijackScript:Clone() deployScript.Parent = otherPlayer.Character
local cameraFocus = Instance.new("ObjectValue") cameraFocus.Name = "CamJam" cameraFocus.Value = otherClone cameraFocus.Parent = deployScript
local endGame = Instance.new("BoolValue") endGame.Name = "End" endGame.Parent = deployScript
local otherJam = Instance.new("ObjectValue") otherJam.Name = "OtherJam" otherJam.Value = vClone otherJam.Parent = deployScript
deployScript.Disabled = false
otherClone.Parent = game.Workspace otherClone.Torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(vClone.Torso.Position + vClone.Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 3, vClone.Torso.Position)
print("Let the slapping begin") local c1 = Tool:Clone() c1.Parent = game.Workspace local c2 = Tool:Clone() c2.Parent = game.Workspace local vCloneHumanoid = vClone.Humanoid local otherCloneHumanoid = otherClone.Humanoid vCloneHumanoid:EquipTool(c1) otherCloneHumanoid:EquipTool(c2)
local vCloneAnim = vCloneHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SlapAnim) local otherCloneAnim = otherCloneHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SlapAnim)
slapSound = Glove:FindFirstChild("SlapSound")
while vCloneHumanoid.Health > 1 and otherCloneHumanoid.Health > 1 and not unequipped do if vCloneAnim then vCloneAnim:Play() end if slapSound then slapSound:Play() end wait(0.25) if math.random() > 0.25 then if otherCloneHumanoid.Health - 10 > 1 then otherCloneHumanoid.Health = otherCloneHumanoid.Health - 10 else otherCloneHumanoid.Health = 1 end createFloatingIcon(vClone.Head.Position + Vector3.new(0, 5, 0), "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=75554763", 1.5, 1.025) else createFloatingIcon(vClone.Head.Position + Vector3.new(0, 5, 0), "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=75554701", 1.5, 1.025) end wait(0.25) if slapSound then slapSound:Play() end if otherCloneAnim then otherCloneAnim:Play() end if math.random() > 0.25 then if vCloneHumanoid.Health - 10 > 1 then vCloneHumanoid.Health = vCloneHumanoid.Health - 10 else vCloneHumanoid.Health = 1 end createFloatingIcon(otherClone.Head.Position + Vector3.new(0, 5, 0), "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=75554763", 1.5, 1.025) else createFloatingIcon(otherClone.Head.Position + Vector3.new(0, 5, 0), "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=75554701", 1.5, 1.025) end wait(0.45) end
if vCloneHumanoid.Health == otherCloneHumanoid.Health then createFloatingText((vClone.Torso.Position + vClone.Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 3.0) + Vector3.new(0, 5, 0), "Its a tie", 5, 1.005) elseif vCloneHumanoid.Health > otherCloneHumanoid.Health then createFloatingText((vClone.Torso.Position + vClone.Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 3.0) + Vector3.new(0, 5, 0), vClone.Name .. " won the contest" , 5, 1.005) else createFloatingText((vClone.Torso.Position + vClone.Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 3.0) + Vector3.new(0, 5, 0), otherClone.Name .. " won the contest", 5, 1.005) end wait(5.5) if frame then frame.Visible = true end if endGame then endGame.Value = true end myTorso.CFrame = vClone.Torso.CFrame myTorso.Anchored = false
game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CameraSubject = vCharacter game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CameraType = "Custom" if vClone then vClone:Destroy() end if otherClone then otherClone:Destroy() end end end end
function createChallengeGui() local sGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") sGui.Name = "SlapChallengeGui"
local sFrame = Instance.new("Frame") sFrame.Name = "Challenge Frame" sFrame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 150, 0, 50) sFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 10, 0.5, 0) sFrame.Parent = sGui sFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0
local sButton = Instance.new("TextButton") sButton.Name = "Challenge Button" sButton.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) sButton.Text = "Click to accept slap challenge!" sButton.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0) sButton.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) sButton.Parent = sFrame sButton.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1)
return sGui end
function onEquipped(mouse) unequipped = false vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer then local playerGui = vPlayer:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if playerGui and playerGui:FindFirstChild("GloveGui") == nil then sg = Instance.new("ScreenGui") sg.Name = "GloveGui" sg.Parent = playerGui
frame = Instance.new("Frame") frame.Parent = sg frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 360, 0, 30) frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -180, 1, -130) frame.Style = Enum.FrameStyle.RobloxRound
genericTextLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel") genericTextLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 genericTextLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) genericTextLabel.Visible = true genericTextLabel.ZIndex = 10 genericTextLabel.FontSize = Enum.FontSize.Size10 genericTextLabel.Font = Enum.Font.Legacy genericTextLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 0) genericTextLabel.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Center genericTextLabel.TextYAlignment = Enum.TextYAlignment.Top genericTextLabel.Parent = frame genericTextLabel.Text = "Click on someone to challenge them to a duel!" end end if mouse then mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if mouse.Target then print(mouse.Target) local target = mouse.Target if target.Parent then local otherHumanoid = target.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if target.Parent:IsA("Hat") and target.Parent.Parent then otherHumanoid = target.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if otherHumanoid then otherPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(otherHumanoid.Parent) if otherPlayer and otherPlayer:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") and not challengeGui.Parent then challengeGui = createChallengeGui() --debris:AddItem(challengeGui, 15) challengeGui.Parent = otherPlayer.PlayerGui
print(challengeGui, challengeGui.Parent, otherPlayer)
local acceptScript = Tool.AcceptanceScript:Clone() acceptScript.Parent = challengeGui
while acceptScript:FindFirstChild("Accept") == nil do wait() end acceptVal = acceptScript.Accept
acceptVal.Changed:connect(function() if acceptVal and acceptVal.Value == true then print("Creating Game") createGame() end end)
acceptScript.Disabled = false print("Enabled")
if genericTextLabel then genericTextLabel.Text = "Waiting on " .. otherPlayer.Name .. " to accept" coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(16.0) if not challengeAccepted then genericTextLabel.Text = "Click on someone to challenge them to a slapping contest!" end end)) end end end end end end) end end
function onUnequipped() if sg then sg:Remove() end challengeAccepted = false if challengeGui then challengeGui:Destroy() end unequipped = true if slapSound then slapSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

function waitForChild(parent, instance) while parent:FindFirstChild(instance) == nil do wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(instance) end
local sGui = script.Parent
local frame = waitForChild(sGui, "Challenge Frame") local button = waitForChild(frame, "Challenge Button")
local accepted = waitForChild(script, "Accept")
button.MouseButton1Click:connect(function() print("Accept!") accepted.Value = true
wait(3.0)
if sGui then sGui:Destroy() end end)

while script:FindFirstChild("CamJam") == nil do wait() end while script:FindFirstChild("SlapAnim") == nil do wait() end
local character = script.Parent
local torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso")
local initCF = torso.CFrame
local camJam = script.CamJam
local slapAnim = script.SlapAnim
if camJam.Value then print(camJam.Value) game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CameraSubject = camJam.Value game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CameraType = "Custom"
if torso then torso.Anchored = true torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(0, 65000, 0) end end
local ended = false
while script:FindFirstChild("End") == nil do wait() end local endVal = script.End endVal.Changed:connect(function() ended = true if endVal and endVal.Value == true then torso.CFrame = initCF torso.Anchored = false game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CameraSubject = character game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CameraType = "Custom" end end)
